Text:
You are god!

I've been looking for any part of this for years... My parents taped the original pilot in England and I watched that tape so often that I had to take it apart and re-attach the end of it many times...

THANK YOU!
You sir, as orion888 said, are god. Much like orion, I saw the first episode many times as a child, and have since been searching everywhere for this. Hats off to you.
